SELECT boardNumber, userNumber, userName, boardTitle, boardWriteDate, boardHit, boardViews, boardLikes FROM ( SELECT rownum as rn, boardNumber, userNumber, userName, boardTitle, boardWriteDate, boardHit, boardViews, boardLikes FROM ( SELECT boardNumber, userNumber, userName, boardTitle, boardWriteDate, boardHit, boardViews, boardLikes FROM board
ORDER BY boardNumber DESC ) a where rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) )aa where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into board(boardNumber, userNumber, userName, boardTitle, boardContent) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(boardNumber), 0) + 1 FROM board), #{userNumber}, #{userName}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent})
mapper.select: select boardNumber, userNumber, userName, boardTitle, boardContent, boardWriteDate, boardHit, boardViews, boardLikes from board where boardNumber=#{boardNumber}
mapper.update: update board set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContent=#{boardContent} where boardNumber=#{boardNumber}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board_likes WHERE boardNumber = #{boardNumber} AND userNumber = #{userNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET boardLikes = CASE WHEN boardLikes > 0 THEN boardLikes - 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE boardNumber = #{boardNumber}
